title: 小伙伴们都上什么网站找服务器呢
author: Sleaf
txt_content: 各位玩友们 你们都平时都上什么网站去寻找自己想玩的服务器呢想了解了解 什么网站 人去的最多

replies.author: zjxx
replies.txt_content: 就这个论坛找锕【虽然我服务器玩的并不多】

replies.author: 13579hehe
replies.txt_content: 当然MCBBS啊

replies.author: RINNDA
replies.txt_content: mcbbs的服务器版

replies.author: 木守
replies.txt_content: MCBBS的服务器最正规了，当然是这里咯

replies.author: yubanmeiqin
replies.txt_content: 肯定mcbbs啊。A.A

replies.author: 刺客刀手
replies.txt_content: 果断这里，你在这里问。答案只有一个：MCBBS

replies.author: soud
replies.txt_content: 去mcbbs服务器板块

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content: 在Mcbbs问如果回答其他论坛的话会被蒸发掉吧

replies.author: Reon_Aqest
replies.txt_content: 我的世界服务区吧

replies.author: yubanmeiqin
replies.txt_content: 当然是mcbbs啊

replies.author: caoqinbhang
replies.txt_content: 找服务器，当然就选MCBBS,上万个服务器同时在线，你值得入坑

replies.author: e951357
replies.txt_content: 必须MCBBS呀人多刺激
不刻意去找，就看看B站，找到好玩的服务器然后在MCBBS搜索就OJBK了

replies.author: dabagehaoniu
replies.txt_content: 服务器吧啊~mcbbs帖子都有

replies.author: w153140
replies.txt_content: mcbbs和服务器吧

replies.author: xianren66
replies.txt_content: http://www.mcbbs.net/forum-server-1.html

replies.author: cog12
replies.txt_content: mcbbs。。。。。。

replies.author: Huai_yu
replies.txt_content: 当然是我大MCBBS啦~
肯定mcbbs啊

当然是mcbbs的服务器板块啦

也可以顺便举报一些违规的服务器帖子

http://www.mcbbs.net/forum-server-1.html

replies.author: player_steve233
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 海贼王#
replies.txt_content: mcbbs 麦块 百度贴吧

replies.author: AhtistedAtomic
replies.txt_content: 我就喜欢在这，就是mcbbs找，因为bbs服务器审核的挺严的，也蛮容易通过关键字或者模式找到自己想玩的服务器。很容易找到高质量服务器。我玩的都是这里找的，超棒。

replies.author: 张一龙哥
replies.txt_content: 肯定MCBBS啊因为这里的最全

replies.author: QTLcom
replies.txt_content:
当然MCBBS啊

贴吧也有的

实在找不到就去直播平台看看

replies.author: 陶醉的黑兔
replies.txt_content: 抢沙发抢沙发抢沙发抢沙发
